task.title: How to Subtract Numbers
task.shortdesc: The task explains how to subtract the numbers using the JPS Calculator.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully subtract, you must know what is subtraction.
taskbody.result: The result from the subtraction is displayed.
taskbody.example: Consider that the two numbers are 5 and 3. When you subtract 3 from 5, you will get 2. The equation will look like 5-3=2 on the JPS Calculator.
